## Objective

Define and deliver the scope for `v0.1.3` with clear acceptance criteria.

## Proposed Scope

- [ ] Improve optimization decision transparency in `last_action` messages.
- [ ] Add extra tests for edge cases in load cooldown/min-on-time behavior.
- [ ] Refine documentation for real mode entity validation and expected units.

## Technical Tasks

- [ ] Implement selected logic changes.
- [ ] Add/adjust unit tests and integration tests.
- [ ] Run full CI (`Hassfest` + `HACS Validation` + `pytest`).
- [ ] Update `CHANGELOG.md` with `0.1.3` draft notes.

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All checklist items completed.
- [ ] CI green on default branch.
- [ ] Release tag `v0.1.3` prepared.

## Notes

Use this issue as the single source of truth for `v0.1.3` planning and progress.
